00020 #include <avr/io.h>
00021 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00022 #include <stdio.h>
00023 #include <string.h>
00024 
00031 void usart0_init(unsigned int baudrate) {
00032         /* Set baud rate */
00033         UBRR0H = (unsigned char) (baudrate>>8);
00034         UBRR0L = (unsigned char) baudrate;
00035         /* Set frame format: 8data, no parity & 1 stop bits */
00036         UCSR0C = (0<<UMSEL0) | (0<<USBS0) | (1<<UCSZ1) | (1<<UCSZ0) | (0<<UCSZ2);
00037         /* Enable receiver and transmitter */
00038         UCSR0B = (1<<RXEN0) | (1<<TXEN0) | (1<<RXCIE0);
00039 }
00040 
00044 unsigned char usart0_transmit(char  data ) {
00045         /* Wait for empty transmit buffer */
00046         while (!( UCSR0A & (1<<UDRE0)));
00047         /* Put data into buffer, sends the data */
00048         UDR0 = data;
00049         return 0;
00050 }
00051 
00056 unsigned char usart0_sendstring(char *data,unsigned char length) {
00057         int i;
00058         for (i=0;i<length;i++)
00059                 usart0_transmit(*(data++));
00060         
00061         return 0;
00062 }
00063 
00069 unsigned char usart0_receive(void ) {
00070         /* Wait for data to be received */
00071         while (!(UCSR0A & (1<<RXC0)));
00072         /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00073         return UDR0;
00074 }
00075 
00081 unsigned char usart0_receive_loopback(void ) {
00082         uint8_t rbuff;
00083         /* Wait for data to be received */
00084         while (!(UCSR0A & (1<<RXC0)));
00085         /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00086         rbuff = UDR0;
00087         usart0_transmit(rbuff);
00088         return rbuff;
00089 }
00090 
00096 unsigned char poll_usart0_receive(void ) {
00097         /* Check if data is received */
00098         return ((UCSR0A & (1<<RXC0)));
00099 }
00100 
00107 void usart1_init(unsigned int baudrate) {
00108         /* Set baud rate */
00109         UBRR1H = (unsigned char) (baudrate>>8);
00110         UBRR1L = (unsigned char) baudrate;
00111         /* Set frame format: 8data, no parity & 1 stop bits */
00112         UCSR1C = (0<<UMSEL0) | (0<<USBS0) | (1<<UCSZ1) | (1<<UCSZ0) | (0<<UCSZ2);
00113         /* Enable receiver and transmitter */
00114         UCSR1B = (1<<RXEN1) | (1<<TXEN1);
00115 }
00116 
00120 unsigned char usart1_transmit(char  data ) {
00121         /* Wait for empty transmit buffer */
00122         while (!( UCSR1A & (1<<UDRE1)));
00123         /* Put data into buffer, sends the data */
00124         UDR1 = data;
00125         return 0;
00126 }
00127 
00132 unsigned char usart1_sendstring(char *data,unsigned char length) {
00133         int i;
00134         for (i=0;i<length;i++)
00135                 usart1_transmit(*(data++));
00136         
00137         return 0;
00138 }

00145 unsigned char usart1_receive(void ) {
00146         /* Wait for data to be received */
00147         while (!(UCSR1A & (1<<RXC1)));
00148         /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00149         return UDR0;
00150 }
00151

00164         return rbuff;
